---
title: "Contact Me"
---

For contact information, please fill out the below:

<form action="https://formsubmit.co/adebenedictis2020@gmail.com" method="POST">
  <label for="name">Name</label>
  <input type="text" name="name" required>

  <label for="email">Email</label>
  <input type="email" name="email" required>

  <label for="message">Message</label>
  <textarea name="message" rows="5" required></textarea>

  <label>
    <input type="checkbox" name="resume_request">
    I'd like a copy of your résumé
  </label>

  <!-- Optional spam protection -->
  <input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false">

  <button type="submit">Send</button>
</form>

form {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 2rem auto;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 1rem;
  padding: 1rem;
  background: #1e1e1e;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

input, textarea {
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 6px;
}

label {
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

button {
  background: #ffcc00;
  color: black;
  font-weight: bold;
  border: none;
  padding: 0.75rem;
  border-radius: 6px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
